file_content.text: Good luck in the Foundry. We'll stay and guard the ship.
Helmsman? Set course for the Foundry.
Yes, my lord. Laying in course.
Acknowledged. Laying in course.
Any words to the crew before the assault?
Our ancestors fought the Jedi a thousand years ago. You continue their work--you fight for the Sith and for the Empire!
If you die, die for the Sith!
Those who do my bidding will win the favor of the Sith. That is all you need know.
Serve well, and be rewarded.
The Republic seeks to destroy us, but we will wrest their weapon from their hands. Remember this day.
We fight for our homeland!
I'm not Imperial. I'm not your captain. But I have a job to do, and you're going to help.
Follow my lead and back me up.
This mission will be dangerous, but no one gets left behind. No one gets sacrificed. You have my word.
Everyone's coming back alive.
Course set. Engaging hyperdrive.
They know their duty, and I'm not here to comfort them. Make the jump to lightspeed.
Don't waste my time.
Aye-aye. Engaging hyperdrive.
Transmitting authorization codes to the Republic fleet. They're allowing us to pass the blockade....
Approaching the Foundry. Receiving transmission!
This is landing control to Republic cruiser Dorin's Sky. You're six hours off-schedule; is there a problem?
We're fine, thank you.
We had to adjust course to avoid an Imperial patrol. Nothing to be concerned about.
We had to adjust course to avoid an Imperial patrol. Nothing to be concerned about.
We had to adjust course to avoid an Imperial patrol. Nothing to be concerned about.
Understood. You have permission to dock; you can wait aboard the ship while we run the final security checks.
You're out of line, soldier!
I won't be interrogated by some peon. Get out of my way so I can land this ship and make my report to your superiors.
I won't be interrogated by some peon. Get out of my way so I can land this ship and make my report to your superiors.
I won't be interrogated by some peon. Get out of my way so I can land this ship and make my report to your superiors.
I'm sorry, sir, but I--look, I can bring you into dock, but you'll need to remain aboard the ship. I can't clear you.
We're past the blockade. Get us to the Foundry.
[Disconnect]
I'll see if I can fake a comm malfunction, but they'll be suspicious. Going in.
We're docked. Estimate two minutes until our fleet arrives and the battle begins.
If I may be so bold, I suggest you take the offensive.
All systems online.
If you die, die for the Sith!
If you die, die for the Sith!
Serve well, and be rewarded.
Serve well, and be rewarded.
We fight for our homeland!
We fight for our homeland!
Follow my lead and back me up.
Follow my lead and back me up.
Everyone's coming back alive.
Everyone's coming back alive.
[Disconnect]
